mapper.sql: t.DD_GUID as DD_GUID ,t.DD_TYPE_GUID as DD_TYPE_GUID ,t.DD_TYPE_CODE as DD_TYPE_CODE ,t.DD_CODE as DD_CODE ,t.DD_NAME as DD_NAME ,t.DD_DESC as DD_DESC ,t.PARENT_GUID as PARENT_GUID ,t.IS_END_LEVEL as IS_END_LEVEL ,t.PATH_LEVEL as PATH_LEVEL ,t.PATH_CODE as PATH_CODE ,t.REMARK as REMARK ,t.ROW_ORDER as ROW_ORDER ,t.EXT_COL1 as EXT_COL1 ,t.EXT_COL2 as EXT_COL2 ,t.EXT_COL3 as EXT_COL3 ,t.EXT_COL4 as EXT_COL4 ,t.EXT_COL5 as EXT_COL5 ,t.EXT_COL6 as EXT_COL6 ,t.EXT_COL7 as EXT_COL7 ,t.EXT_COL8 as EXT_COL8 ,t.EXT_COL9 as EXT_COL9 ,t.EXT_COL10 as EXT_COL10 ,t.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE ,t.CREATE_USER_ID as CREATE_USER_ID ,t.MODIFY_DATE as MODIFY_DATE ,t.MODIFY_USER_ID as MODIFY_USER_ID ,t.DELETE_DATE as DELETE_DATE ,t.DELETE_USER_ID as DELETE_USER_ID ,t.DELETE_FLAG as DELETE_FLAG
mapper.select:
select
from T_SJAA_CODE t
order by desc
order by asc

select
from T_SJAA_CODE t where t.DD_GUID = #{ddGuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from T_SJAA_CODE t where t.DD_GUID in
#{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
